title: Cool Lady
subtitle: Digital Piece
alt: brown haired girl staring down at you with bubble spiked hair, a red jacket top, and gold necklace
description:
2022 

This was my second piece working with the Aaron Griffin Brush set. I really was able to sink into this set and use it comfortably in this piece and I love the way it turned out. It has cemented itself into my process forever.
